item.title: RemoteControl v1.2.0.7
item.description:
Product: RemoteControl v1.2.0.7
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Wed, 27 Nov 2024 14:56:01 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Parent library for sending messages to programs occupying different application instances, ie, LabVIEW running on different computers, multiple instances of LabVIEW on a single computer, or compiled applications. By itself this library does not implement a specific or even working communication protocol, but provides abstract methods that can be overridden by, for example, ZMQ, MQTT, etc.

Release Notes: [1.2.0]
- Issue #120 use debug attribute
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: D2XX-LV v1.2.0.6
item.description:
Product: D2XX-LV v1.2.0.6
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Thu, 21 Nov 2024 21:36:41 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin / LevyLab

Description: This library provides an interface to FTDI's D2XX drivers, designed to align more closely with LabVIEW programming conventions.

Release Notes: - add support for 64 bit library (Issue #4)
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: D2XX v1.2.0.5
item.description:
Product: D2XX v1.2.0.5
Company: FTDI
Release Date: Thu, 21 Nov 2024 20:48:33 -0500
Packager: FTDI / Patrick Irvin

Description: examples of communicating with FTDI devices through the D2XX drivers and FTD2XX.dll / FTD2XX64.dll using LabVIEW. This package organizes files provided by FTDI into a LV library

Release Notes: add support for 64 bit
item.dc:creator: FTDI

item.title: LV-Data v3.9.1.6
item.description:
Product: LV-Data v3.9.1.6
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 21 Nov 2024 15:06:57 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: - Collection of VIs to write and read files in TDMS, Igor Text (*.itx), and text-based spreadsheet data (*.dat) formats.
- LV graph to Igor Pro and Igor Pro formatters
- Tools are provided for uploading to and downloading from AWS S3

Release Notes: [3.9.1]
- updated package dependencies
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
